title: The National Director is Mr. Perfect - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Gender Bender   Josei   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi
tags: Androgynous Characters   Artificial Intelligence   Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Business Management   Cross-dressing   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hackers   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mysterious Family Background   Narcissistic Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Showbiz   Transmigration   Ugly to Beautiful   Wealthy Characters
author: Gu Mushuang
description:
The popular and magnificent ‘crown prince’ was reborn into a disfigured little pathetic girl whom everyone loathes. 

The Crown Prince expressed that this all didn’t matter! 

The body’s original appearance was actually a face that everyone, men and women, old and young, would go crazy for. 

“He” was the perfect lover in the hearts of countless men and women. 

Anyone would dream of marrying her! 

But one day, the prince charming became a goddess? 

Male fans: How explosive! 

Jiang Yi: I’m not going to accept this, I am her husband! 

Jun Ci smirked. So what exactly are you not accepting?>
